products.title: Vesper Snow Roller Blind
products.description: A sheer fabric with a vertical stripe design which provides privacy during the day whilst still allowing natural light through. Their vesper snow roller blind is a patterned white blind. Free delivery across all orders over 145. Nationwide coverage. Free samples.
